default_message: ${filename}: Error found: ${lexical.value} at line ${lexical.line} and column ${lexical.column}

error_messages.message: ${filename}: Expecting a symbol before '${lexical.value}' at line ${lexical.line} and column ${lexical.column}
${filename}: Expecting a symbol before '0' at line ${lexical.line} and column ${lexical.column}
